DOC.brief_summary: A randomize control trial compare independent medical evaluation ( IME ) treatment usual ( TAU ) . Participants individual reach six month uninterrupted sickness absence . Treatment usual ( TAU ) normal follow-up general practitioner ( GP ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Evaluation Independent Medical Evaluation ( IME ) Norway
DOC.detailed_description: A randomize control trial Norwegian context , involve effect evaluation , cost-benefit evaluation qualitative evaluation . Independent medical evaluation ( IME ) compare treatment usual ( TAU ) . Independent medical evaluation ( IME ) comprise consultation independent general practitioner ( IME GP ) ass whether sick list worker give eligible available opportunity return work follow-up Norway . The independent medical evaluation general practitioner ( IME GP ) write short report send treat general practitioner input colleague . The report use follow-up sick list participant . The participant treatment usual ( TAU ) group receive follow-up normal follow-up treat general practitioner . The qualitative evaluation conduct gain insight experience general practitioner participant .
